property.name: troilkatt.admin.email
property.description: Administrator e-mail. It is used as password when logging to NCBI FTP servers.

property.name: troilkatt.persistent.storage
property.description: File system for persistent storage. Valid values: hadoop and nfs

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.dir
property.description: Directory on local filesystem used by Troilkatt server and clients for intermediate files. The TROILKATT.DIR symbol is mapped to this directory.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.log.dir
property.description: Directory where the main logfiles are stored. Additional logfiles are stored in the (intermediate) output directories for the crawlers and pipeline stages.

property.name: troilkatt.globalfs.global-meta.dir
property.description: This directory contains various global meta-data files used by many Troilkatt stage such as gold standards, gene names files, etc. The TROILKATT.GLOBALMETA_DIR is mapped to this directory.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.sge.dir
property.description: This directory contains local files for the SGE jobs

property.name: troilkatt.globalfs.sge.dir
property.description: This directory contains globally shared files for SGE jobs.

property.name: troilkatt.global-meta.retain.days
property.description: Time in days for which global-meta data is retained before being deleted. If -1 global-meta is never deleted.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.mapreduce.dir
property.description: This directory is used by MapReduce jobs to save temporal data on the local FS.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.binary.dir
property.description: This directory contains binaries for progeams started by Troilkatt. The TROILKATT.BIN symbol is mapped to this directory.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.utils.dir
property.description: This directory contains various scripts and tools used by the stages. The TROILKATT.UTILS symbol is mapped to this directory.

property.name: troilkatt.localfs.scripts.dir
property.description: This directory contains various scripts for processing a Troilkatt stage. The TROILKATT.SCRIPTS symbol is mapped to this directory.

property.name: troilkatt.tfs.root.dir
property.description: Root directory for Troilkatt files in HDFS.

property.name: troilkatt.tfs.status.file
property.description: This file contains the status of troilkatt iterations. It is used to do recovery by checking the status of the last update before initiating a new update.

property.name: troilkatt.update.interval.hours
property.description: Time in hours between each time the crawlers are called.

property.name: troilkatt.jar
property.description: Jar file with Troilkatt MapReduce classes

property.name: troilkatt.libjars
property.description: Jar files passed to the hadoop MapReduce startup script (-libjars). These should include: hbase.jar, commons-cli.jar, zookeeper.jar, commons-logging.jar
